description: Get the list of shipping centers and request parameters needed before calling v2/return/upload_shipping_proof

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Unix timestamp of the request. Required for calculating sign.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This field is required to call the API. Access token expires in 24 hours.

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if/if error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if/if error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: Generated UUID based to an error. Required needs for error tracking

children.name: is_shipping_proof_ready
children.description: To indicate whether uploading shipping proof is possible for partner to upload shipping proof

children.name: has_provided_carrier_pre
children.description: To indicate whether carrier information is provided

children.name: shipping_proof_timeout
children.description: To display list of timeout parameters needed to provide

children.name: is_tracking_number_m_mandatory
children.description: To indicate whether it is mandatory to provide tracking number during uploading shipping proof

children.name: is_shipping_image_file_mandatory
children.description: To indicate whether it is mandatory to provide shipping image file/s when uploading shipping proof

children.name: reverse_logistic_carrier_list
children.description: The list of logistic carriers available for users to select

children.name: reverse_logistics_user_id
children.description: To indicate the selected carrier name from the list of carrier names provided
